commands.name: az network custom-ip prefix create
commands.summary: Create a custom IP prefix resource.
commands.syntax:
az network custom-ip prefix create --name
                                   --resource-group
                                   [--asn]
                                   [--authorization-message]
                                   [--cidr]
                                   [--cip-prefix-parent]
                                   [--express-route-advertise {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--geo {AFRI, APAC, AQ, EURO, GLOBAL, LATAM, ME, NAM, OCEANIA}]
                                   [--is-parent {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--location]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--prefix-type {Child, Parent, Singular}]
                                   [--signed-message]
                                   [--tags]
                                   [--zone]
examples: az network custom-ip prefix create --location westus2 --name MyCustomIpPrefix --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network custom-ip prefix delete
commands.summary: Delete a custom IP prefix resource.
commands.syntax:
az network custom-ip prefix delete [--ids]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--subscription]
examples: az network custom-ip prefix delete --name MyCustomIpPrefix --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network custom-ip prefix list
examples: az network custom-ip prefix list --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network custom-ip prefix show
commands.summary: Get the details of a custom IP prefix resource.
examples: az network custom-ip prefix show --name MyCustomIpPrefix --resource-group MyResourceGroup --subscription MySubscription

commands.name: az network custom-ip prefix update
commands.summary: Update a custom IP prefix resource.
commands.syntax:
az network custom-ip prefix update [--add]
                                   [--authorization-message]
                                   [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--ids]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--no-internet-advertise {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--remove]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--set]
                                   [--signed-message]
                                   [--state {commission, decommission, deprovision, provision}]
                                   [--subscription]
                                   [--tags]
examples: az network custom-ip prefix update --name MyCustomIpPrefix --resource-group MyResourceGroup --tags foo=bar

commands.name: az network custom-ip prefix wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
